airline.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane
airline.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an organization offering transport by plane for passengers and goods
airline.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: IBM is an IT supplier to most major airlines world wide.
It is considering operating as a charter airline (=an airline whose planes can be hired).
It had to restructure its business, as no-frills airlines began to cut into its profits.
